name: Tic Tac Toe (itch) (Toax12)
description:
The simple Tic Tac Toe game, revisited with a minimal and simple style.

Soon more updates will arrive!

How to play:

- On the menu, click C to see the credits;

- To start the game, click on the window or press SPACE;

- Click with the mouse or press the numbers from 1 to 9 to place the square;

- The rules of the game are the same as the classic Tic Tac Toe game;

- At the end of the match, click on the screen or press SPACE to restart the game;

- Press ESC to go back.
